_header: Blessed Sebastian Gods martyr and knight
Note: For a prose version see Princeton, Princeton University Library University Library, Robert H. Taylor MS 17 (olim Thompson (Portland, Oregon) [olim Amherst 20 prior Phillipps]), f. 14v.
_description: A prayer to St Sebastian — seven stanzas rhyme royal

BLHar372.First Lines:
Blessid Sebastian goddis martir and knyghtBe oure protectur
                        our sheld and oure wall…
BLHar372.Last Lines:
…We pray þe Sebastiane & so put to þine
                        handeWhanne God with pestilence liste scourge
                    Ynglonde
BLHar372.Note:
Unique witness; Prayer to St Sebastian; seven rhyme royal stanzas,
                    crossed through; in second column a Latin prose prayer to St Sebastian also
                    crossed through,
BLHar372.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “A Middle English Prayer to St. Mary Magdalen.” 
             Traditio
         24 (1968): 458-64: 463-4.
